text: is a Japanese professional athlete and sports commentator. He is best known as a tennis player.Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP), Shuzo Matsuoka; retrieved 2012-7-22. He was a tennis player on the Japanese national team at the Summer Olympic Games in 1988 at Seoul, in 1992 at Barcelona and in 1996 at Atlanta.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "Shuzo Matsuoka" ; retrieved 2012-7-22. ==Tennis career== ATP tour, best singles rank: *46th place ATP tour, singles rank: *1985. 691 *1986. 370 *1987. 260 *1988. 82 *1989. 181 *1990. 144 *1991. 67 *1992. 64 *1993. 134 *1994. 124 *1995. 57 *1996. 149 KAL Cup: *Victory Stella-Artois Queen's Club grass court tournament: *Lost the final in 1992 to Wayne Ferreira Wimbledon: *Best 8 in 1995 (quarterfinals), lost to Pete Sampras who won the tournament ==Related pages== * Sports in Japan * Japan at the Olympics ==References== Category:Male tennis players Category:Japanese tennis players Category:Sports commentators Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Tokyo
title: Shuzo Matsuoka
